Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Observation
b) Defect Observed: Flight control cable fraying detected. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Corrosion due to moisture accumulation in sealed compartment
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Fuel System component. Testing
confirmed performance below acceptable limits.
c) Remedial Measures Replace entire assembly due to extent of damage
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Introduce protective coating to prevent environmental degradation
d) Attributable Code: M - Other Reasons
Remarks: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings.
Date: 27/09/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. P.L. Mehta
